results.title: Streets of Fitzroy [Subtitled]
results.creator_credit: Mick Booth, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description:
Mick Booth was brought up in Kent Street, Fitzroy - an inner suburb of Melbourne. This is his story of childhood memories, family and growing up in Fitzroy.
In English language with English subtitles.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Mick Booth, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: A Life in community
results.creator_credit: Than Van Nguyen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Arriving in Australia as a refugee from Vietnam, Than Van Nguyen has dedicated his life to community involvement and the Vietnamese community, with his principal goal being ‘solidarity, unity, being united’.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Than Van Nguyen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: A Little memory
results.creator_credit: Truyen Dinh Le, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Truyen Dinh Le, a refugee himself from Vietnam, tells a harrowing story of courage and determination by his father-in-law to find peace and a better life for his family, away from the war in Vietnam to the safe haven of Australian shores.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Truyen Dinh Le, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Melbourne (no. 4)
results.brief_description:
General shots (rushes) of Melbourne ‘life’ from the 50s. All images very iconic and nostalgic.

Section 1. Several shots of daffodils in a park. Nice colour, long shots.

Section 2. Shots in a park near the Yarra looking towards the city.

Section 3. Shots of Fitzroy gardens, conservatory and Government House.

Section 4. Shots of large houses in Toorak.

Section 5. ANZAC day march in the city. Many people involved.

results.title: RMIT AIM Collection 1994
results.brief_description:
Compilation of student work from the University of RMIT Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) Department. 1994.
The Centre for Animation and Interactive Media, its courses, facilities, staff and collection of work was transferred from Swinburne University of Technology to RMIT University in 1995.
